sub_topic: Determining the chromatic number of a graph.
message_1:
Given a graph G with 7 vertices as shown in the figure, determine the chromatic number of the graph.

(Insert an image of a graph with 7 vertices and edges)
message_2: As an AI language model, I cannot see or interpret images. However, I can help you determine the chromatic number of a graph if you provide me with the adjacency information of the graph. Please describe the graph in terms of its vertices and edges, or provide the adjacency matrix or adjacency list.
